Look for Traffic not Traffic Lights

Traffic lights should be removed from the streets of London and everywhere else for that matter. They are a monumental waste of time and money. As a cyclist in London you are 100's of times more likely to be killed obeying traffic lights than jumping them.

Pedal Cyclist Fatalities Involving Goods Vehicles

 

Cyclists lead by example in the struggle to have traffic lights removed.

Cyclists so often criticised for jumping traffic lights are infact doing the sensible thing and should be thanked by society for showing traffic lights to be the waste of time money and life they are.
ASL Findings Report

 

*T-SHIRT UPDATE*

This t-shirt design is particularly pertinent. The Times have started a 'Save our cyclists' campaign in response to the many recent, often fatal, accidents involving cyclsits on our city streets. Trauma surgeon Thomas König speaks out about the increase in serious/fatal injuries suffered by cyclists, while six Olympic champions join thousands of commuters in backing The Times' campaign for safer roads.

Whatever your view on traffic lights, surely you must agree that a change is well overdue!
